message: Take it, it's a fair deal!
Last chance to make a deal, Bob!
You're running out of time, Alice! Don't be greedy!
I'm not getting any younger, Bob. Meet me in the middle!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not going to back down now!
I'm not giving up yet, Bob. Let's make a deal!
You're really running out of time, Alice. Don't waste any more of it!
Last stand, Bob. Meet me halfway!
You're down to your last chance, Alice. Don't mess it up!
This is it, Bob. My final offer. Take it or leave it!
It's now or never, Alice. Take it or we both lose everything!
